item.title: Browser Simulation for Data Analysis
item.description: View this post on Instagram IPFS use cases: * censor redundancy * privacy, anti-surveillance communication * decentralized data transfer Societies that value these socio-economic issues also tend to use technologies that enable these values. for example, Telegram started out as an encrypted messaging software that prevented nation state-level surveillance for European users. IPFS came into fore alongside other decentralized enabling technologies such as Bitcoin, Ethererum, and WebRTC.

item.title: Peer to Peer File Transfer Protocol
item.description: View this post on Instagram IPFS use cases: * censor redundancy * privacy, anti-surveillance communication * decentralized data transfer Societies that value these socio-economic issues also tend to use technologies that enable these values. for example, Telegram started out as an encrypted messaging software that prevented nation state-level surveillance for European users. IPFS came into fore alongside other decentralized enabling technologies such as Bitcoin, Ethererum, and WebRTC.

item.title: Flutter mini app

item.title: Hackathon backend boilerplate
item.description: Features: JWT based content authentication Lambda serverless compute hosting Golang API DynammoDB based cloud database persistence https://github.com/ctalladen78/dynamodb_todoapp

item.title: Payment app prototype
item.description: View this post on Instagram Its really exciting to see how different cultures do business. As I travel through different countries, I notice how well people around the world do business reflects the values they hold as a society. For example, in Thailand, it is a Buddhist society, which believes in the circular nature of karma. They believe that kindness freely given to others comes back over time.

item.title: Preferred Tech Stack
item.description: View this post on Instagram why did i choose this stack? it took me about a year to learn this because of the nature of tech being ever changing. it was a way to future-proof my skills and give people awesome and cool products A post shared by Cyan Delta (@cyandelta.app) on Mar 25, 2020 at 6:13am PDT

item.title: Simple Prototype Auth using AWS Serverless Cloud
item.description: https://github.com/ctalladen78/serverless-lambda-aws-go-boilerplate View this post on Instagram Authentication schemes are methods used to prove identity. Here they are ranked in order of vulnerability üóùsingle factor : most vulnerable form of secrets, easily attacked using brute force and man in the middle techniques üóù2-factor : if someone access your email, attackers can easily guess password üóùmultifactor : often used between systems, complex networks, banks.
